name: TechSmith Camtasia Project
summary: A TSCPROJ file is a project created by TechSmith Camtasia, a screen recording and video editing application. It contains the locations of all of the .TREC recordings and media files included in the project, along with the edits and effects applied to the project. The Windows version of Camtasia saves projects as TSCPROJ files by default, while the macOS version saves projects as .CMPROJ files; both versions can open TSCPROJ files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
